mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mustard plaster
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: J. Ellwood Lee Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Empty mustard plaster packet and instructions; instructions title page reads: "How. When. Where. To Apply Mustard Plaster So It Will Do The Most Good. By Doctors Who Use Them. A Good Thing. Johnson & Johnson Mustard Plasters."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pharmaceutical technology--Plaster (Pharmacy)
